summary: This is a brief email chain from June 13, 2019, between individuals with email addresses from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). The subject is forwarding an 'Epstein memo' and includes a side query about whether someone is 'staying on R Kelly.' It indicates coordination and document sharing related to the Epstein case within the prosecution team.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Epstein memo and R Kelly
events.description: An email chain among US Attorney's Office personnel discussing the forwarding of an 'Epstein memo' and a query about an individual's involvement in the R Kelly case.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 13, 2019, involving personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject includes forwarding an 'Epstein memo,' indicating active case work and document sharing related to Jeffrey Epstein within the prosecution team.
A side query asks 'Where did land on whether [redacted] was staying on R Kelly?', showing possible overlapping personnel or considerations between the Epstein and R. Kelly investigations.
